title: Mfahd
author: Mfahd
content: Bibox cryptocurrency exchange locked my account since 6 days. I contact online customer service but still my issue not solve. I think bibox exchange scamming me and steal my funds. What I do now?

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Wrong section. Your account was automatically flagged by their system and until a human can have a look and see what's wrong you most likely won't get an e-mail back. Are you sure you didn't use your account to do whatever Bibox doesn't allow?

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: You posted in the wrong section... Move the thread to Exchanges or you can move it to scam accusation board after creating a proper scam accusation with all the proofs.Never used the exchange before, but it looks like their support is a big mess.

comments.author: Text
comments.body: Quote from: Mfahd on July 07, 2022, 03:22:12 AMBibox cryptocurrency exchange locked my account since 6 days. I contact online customer service but still my issue not solve. I think bibox exchange scamming me and steal my funds. What I do now?Did they respond? What did they say? Did you know why your account has been locked?If yes, then just follow their instructions.I'm not familiar with this exchange, this is also my first time hearing about them. It is currently on rank 153.So at first, why did you choose them? Why not use instead the top exchanges?

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: Mfahd on July 07, 2022, 03:22:12 AMBibox cryptocurrency exchange locked my account since 6 days. I contact online customer service but still my issue not solve. I think bibox exchange scamming me and steal my funds. What I do now?It's the first time I've heard of this platform, I believe you and I hope you can access your account but you don't provide enough information to help you: - Have you contacted the support team? - What was their response? - Have you searched for similar stories? - Have you read the terms of use and made sure that you did not violate them? - your country allowed?They generally have a bad reputation on fxempire[1], so avoid using them.[1] https://www.fxempire.com/crypto/exchange/bibox/review

comments.author: CryptoYar
comments.body: Quote from: Mfahd on July 07, 2022, 03:22:12 AMBibox cryptocurrency exchange locked my account since 6 days. I contact online customer service but still my issue not solve. Have you got any response from them? If not, then wait for it. Hopefully, your issue will be resolved.Quote from: Mfahd on July 07, 2022, 03:22:12 AMI think bibox exchange scamming me and steal my funds. What I do now?I don't know if this exchange is scam or not but right now you have no option except waiting.by the way there is a phishing website of bibox exchange, and users of this exchange should be aware of it.Code:https://wnw-bitbox.com/en/login/?https://archive.ph/JTJaqQuote17 days oldCreated on 2022-06-20Expires on 2023-06-20Updated on 0000-12-31

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Quote from: Mfahd on July 07, 2022, 03:22:12 AMBibox cryptocurrency exchange locked my account since 6 days. I contact online customer service but still my issue not solve. I think bibox exchange scamming me and steal my funds. What I do now?I don't think you have the right website from bibox exchange. is there any way you can share some screenshot for us so we could look into the website if actually correct or not. Secondly before creating any exchange account try to open it from CMC if they are being listed over there then it would be more better for you to get in contact with the right site instead of getting yourself involved with the wrong site.I will advise you to contact them through their live chat or join their telegram group for complaint.Be very sure it is the right website before your accusation.
